npc.name: John
npc.topic: Hello my name is John, I have been (sent=Who sent you?) to (free you=Free me?) and (guide you=Guide me?). You can (ask me=Ask) about (anything=Anything) if you are unsure.
Why the (mayor=Mayor) of course. He has determined that you are innocent of your (crimes=What crimes?).
The past does not matter. You are (free=Free) now.
Well you aren't in this cell voluntarily...
I'll do my best to answer if I know (anything=Anything) about the topic.

Now that you have been released and (don't have anywhere else to go=Home?), you will be needing something to do, and we have no job openings. So I have decided your (new profession=New Profession) for you.
After (what you did=What crimes?) I wouldn't be thinking of home...
Your going to be an (Adventurer=Adventurer) ( =What next?) ( =Why an Adventurer?)!
Well to start with, you can practice your adventuring on some slimes in the sewers. First go to the guild hall and accept my quest.
Lately a lot of dungeons have been popping up around the town.
Mage? Why I am a mage! Would you like to be one?
